data.title: Theodore Bikel Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Theodore Bikel on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Theodore Bikel including The African Queen, My Fair Lady, and more.
data.text:
The Bye-Bye Sky High I.Q. Murder Case

Accountant Oliver Brandt has been embezzling his clientâs funds to supplement his wifeâs expensive taste. When his partner, Bertie Hastings, discovers his financial misdeeds, Brandt slays him. Investigating the crime, Lt. Columbo plays a mental cat-and-mouse game with his clever adversary.

Family

While the USS Enterprise undergoes repair, many crew members reunite with their families.

When the Fat Lady Sings

Jessica (Angela Lansbury) becomes involved in a double-murder investigation when she attends an opera opening with old friend Dennis Stanton (Keith Michell) in San Francisco. Guest stars: Jerry Stiller, Theodore Bikel and Carol Lawrence.

Indian Giver

The descendant (Bernie White) of an American Indian tribe that once lived in the Cabot Cove area brandishes a land grant that seems to prove his claim to the territory. Theodore Bikel, Gary Lockwood and Charles Siebert also guest star.
